snippet: The Denver Museum of Nature and Science will return 30 totems to the National Museums of Kenya, which will decide whether to search for their owners.
abstract: Denver Museum of Nature and Science will return 30 East African memorial totems known as vigango to National Museums of Kenya, which will then decide whether to display the objects, allow them to decay or search for their true owners.
lead_paragraph: The Denver Museum of Nature and Science will return 30 totems to the National Museums of Kenya, which will decide whether to search for their owners.

headline.seo: Denver Museum to Return Totems to Kenyan Museum
headline.main: Sending Artworks Home, but to Whom?
headline.print_headline: Sending Artworks Home, but to Whom?
